Hello and welcome. Before too long, you'll be plotting Hohmann transfers in your sleep! (Or is that just me?)

There's always something new you can learn about the game- just recently I found out that holding the Alt key when placing parts in the VAB or SPH made them only attach by their nodes (the green circles on the ends) and not to a surface that got in the way, very useful when you have a part that's getting in the way.

A word of advice- when you eventually discover mods (that's modifications, not moderators on the forums) don't download everything you find as that's a good way to get overwhelmed by new stuff. Start off simple, keep the numbers low and build up gradually. My top three mod suggestions are: Luciole (by Well) which adds some very nice looking small rocket parts early in the tech tree; Soundtrack Editor (currently looked after by linuxgurugamer) which means you can add your own music to the game; and Restock (by Nertea) which gives the stock parts new (and improved) looks and has an optional extra called Restock Plus which adds some new parts in the same style.
